title: AI Stock-Media Content Creator
description: A next-gen content creation tool that searches stock media, trending news visuals, historical footage, and generates imaginative AI scenes — then auto-syncs everything with narration to produce ready-to-publish short videos.

title: Smart Subtitle Generator
description: An AI-powered tool that automatically generates accurate subtitles for videos — ideal for enhancing accessibility and multilingual support.

title: Universal Video Translator
description: A content creation tool using stock media and AI that translates audio and video — enabling global audience reach with translated content and voiceovers.

title: Clip Composer & Editor
description: A drag-and-drop video clip combiner that helps you create polished video content by merging, ordering, and trimming clips with ease — perfect for quick content creation.

title: Modern E-commerce Platform
description: An all-in-one full-stack e-commerce solution with admin dashboard, inventory management and user notifications — ready to power scalable online stores.

title: Freight Dispatch Portal
description: A dispatch and logistics web-app designed for freight companies to manage shipments, clients and operations — optimized for real-world logistics workflow.
